plot: A pair of radio shock jocks threaten to ruin Leslie's town slogan contest, April and Donna help Tom find a restaurant site, and Andy discovers Ron's alter-ego, Duke Silver.

Leslie (Amy Poehler) aims to create a new town slogan, but runs afoul of local shock jocks (Special Guest Stars Nick Kroll and Matt Besser). Andy (Chris Pratt) scouts bands to play the Unity Concert and discovers an interesting secret about Ron (Nick Offerman), while Tom (Aziz Ansari) looks for a restaurant locale with Donna (Retta) and April (Aubrey Plaza).—Anonymous

New Sloagan - This week Leslie aims to create a new town slogan, but runs afoul of local shock jocks (special guest stars Nick Kroll and Matt Besser). Andy scouts bands to play the Unity Concert and discovers an interesting secret about Ron.
